analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol#450-464) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol#459-460)

TutellusCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,tokensPool) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol)
	-token.mint(teamTimelock,tokensTeam) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol)

TutellusCrowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol#724-735) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_address,tokens) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol#732-733)

TutellusCrowdsale.buyTokens.rate (local variable @ /unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol#708-709) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (state variable @ /unique_chucks/38/0x3f61b512856056d663fd763b880da4a8ed4ceeee.sol#404)
